amendment.description: Amendment directs the EPA Administrator to consult with the Secretary of Agriculture when modifying National Ambient Air Quality Standards with respect to "nuisance dust" under exceptions provided in Sec. 132(b) of the Farm Dust Regulation Prevention Act of 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-317 to direct the Environmental Protection Agency Administrator to consult with the Secretary of Agriculture when modifying National Ambient Air Quality Standards with respect to `nuisance dust' under exceptions provided in Sec. 132(b) of the Farm Dust Regulation Prevention Act of 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Crawford.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Crawford amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
